description: Unique identifier for the miscellaneous cost line entry.
System-maintained date/time of the most recent change to this record; supports auditing and synchronization.
Likely identifier or code for the miscellaneous item or charge applied to the work order; confirm with SME.
Human-readable reference or description associated with the item; confirm with SME.
Work order identifier used for accounting or actual cost posting; often matches the main work order number; confirm with SME.
Reference field indicating the related record type/table for the accounting work order link; confirm with SME.
Work order number that this miscellaneous charge is linked to.
Reference field indicating the related record type/table for the main work order link; confirm with SME.
Free text description of the miscellaneous charge, potentially migrated from a legacy system.
Optional remarks or notes about this charge line.
Extended amount for the line after quantity is applied; may equal unit cost when quantity is one.
Unit cost or price for the charge before quantity and taxes.
Quantity associated with this charge line.
Indicates whether this line is subject to sales or use tax.
Indicates whether this charge should be billed to an external customer or internal department.
Flag indicating whether the entry references an inventory-managed item versus a freeform miscellaneous charge; confirm with SME.
Date the charge line was created or entered into the system.
Identifier from the source legacy system used for data lineage and reconciliation.
Source legacy table name for lineage and troubleshooting.
